pageContext.course_type_long_description: Prepare for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! Build mechanical and structural projects such as dizzying Teacup Rides, customized Cuckoo clocks, and the historic Wright Flyer.  Then learn about concepts such as basic programming skills, sensors, and robotic components while building robots with the WeDo system! Engineering and Robotics come together in this new full-day camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM + Robotics using LEGO® WeDo: FULL DAY
